summary: This module adds OpenTelemetry support to the Litellm library. It defines a configuration class that reads tracing settings from environment variables and a helper class that abstracts span creation, attribute setting, and event logging for both synchronous and asynchronous LLM service calls, management endpoints, and tool interactions, automatically recording success or failure outcomes.
